name: Teenie Townie
description:
Teenie Townie is a condensed city builder/management game. Inspired by games like Townscaper, Ymir, and Foundation, I wanted to scale down the standard city builder, and shoot for a small/low-poly take on the genre. Made in three days, I used Unity for the development and Houdini for the assets/models. The game board has endless variation, utilizing the procedural power of Houdini and HEngine. 

This is technically the first ~complete~  and ~polished~ game that I have released. I undertook this project to enhance my ability to produce under time pressure and contain project ideation to an achievable scope. 

Hope you get a few minutes of interesting gameplay out of it!
